text: Rinzi Lham is an archer from Bhutan. She competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics.Rinzi LHAM She was born on 10 October 1967.Rinzi Lham She was 16 years old, when she competed in the Summer Olympics, making her the youngest Bhutanese athlete to ever compete in the Summer Olympics. == References == Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Bhutanese archers Category:Olympians for Bhutan
title: Rinzi Lham
